Player History

Hit first career homerun on 7/28/1966, off Luis Tiant (BAL)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Kansas City on 7/13/1967...

Injured on 8/16/1969 with a Pulled Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 3 weeks...
Injured on 5/17/1971 with a Herniated Disc Back, out for 4-5 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Detroit on 7/20/1971...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1971, hitting .533 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Traded from New York (A) to Chicago (N) on 1/31/1972 (Going to NYY: P R. Jones. Going to CHC: RF B. Murcer)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/27/1972, hitting .522 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
